jobDescription: A US-based healthtech company that is helping reverse the intergenerational crisis of poor mental and physical health, is looking for a Junior Full-stack Developer. The developer will be working primarily with the COO and CEO on connecting new software to their database and building out the next generation of their platform. The company is helping over 30K members to successfully make the switch from medication to gut-healthy food in order to crush the DIS (Doubt, Inflammation and Stress) in DISease. It is the world's first gut-health, food as medicine program that supercharges health from the inside out by restoring the gut-brain connection, preventing and reversing chronic DISease. This will be a unique opportunity for developers to work for a global movement of individuals, employers, health plans and families.
jobResponsibility: Work as a full-stack development associate to provide additional support for ongoing and upcoming projects. Work closely with the CEO and COO to connect new software to existing databases. Contribute to developing the next generation of existing platforms. Work on connecting APIs and building automation processes. Communicate with executive leadership and necessary team members on a regular basis.
educationalRequirment: Bachelor or Master degree to complete any reputation university.

jobResponsibility: Developing and maintaining all server-side network components. Ensuring optimal performance of the central database and responsiveness to front-end requests. Collaborating with front-end developers on the integration of elements. Designing customer-facing UI and back-end services for various business processes. Developing high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code.Keeping informed of advancements in the field of Node.js development.
educationalRequirment: Bachelor or Master degree  in computer science, information science, or similar.
address: Road No. 12, Niketan, Gulshan-1, Dhaka, Bangladesh

jobDescription: We are looking for a resilient, empathic business development executive to contribute to the growth of our company. Business development executives are responsible for finding and retaining clients, encouraging extant clients to purchase added products or features, and remaining abreast of changes in consumption. You will also be required to build capacity in staff through regular training and mentorship.
jobResponsibility: Familiarizing yourself with all products and services offered by our company. Procuring new clients through direct contact, word-of-mouth, and collaboration with the marketing department. Attending networking activities to research and connect with prospective clients. Maintaining meaningful relationships with existing clients to ensure that they are retained. Suggesting upgrades or added products and services that may be of interest to clients.
educationalRequirment: Bachelor or Master degree to complete any reputation university.

jobResponsibility: Planning concepts by studying relevant information and materials. Illustrating concepts by designing examples of art arrangement, size, type size and style and submitting them for approval. Preparing finished art by operating necessary equipment and software. Coordinating with outside agencies, art services, web designer, marketing, printers, and colleagues as necessary. Contributing to team efforts by accomplishing tasks as needed.
educationalRequirment: Bachelor degree in CSE to complete any reputation university.
